whatIs.question: What is SOZOPIA?
whatIs.answer: SOZOPIA is the next evolution of the beloved Sozopia, built on modern blockchain technology with enhanced features like staking, eco-friendly consensus, and community governance.

howToBuy.question: How can I buy SOZOPIA?
howToBuy.answer: You can buy SOZOPIA through our website during the presale, or on supported exchanges once we go live. Make sure to use only official channels to avoid scams.

staking.question: How does staking work?
staking.answer: Staking allows you to lock your SOZOPIA tokens and earn rewards. Simply connect your wallet to our staking platform, choose your staking period, and start earning passive income.

roadmap.question: What's on the roadmap?
roadmap.answer: Our roadmap includes launching the staking platform, getting listed on major exchanges, developing a mobile app, creating DeFi integrations, and building a complete ecosystem around SOZOPIA.
